Name: Kingdom of Blades
About the game: Play as a front line warrior in the Three Kingdoms Period of China. With nothing to depend on but your swords and your courage, you must slash your way through hordes enemies and face off against the most distinguished of generals on your path to fame and glory. Experience the best in VR swordplay and live out the events of the Three Kingdoms. Engaging Campaign The iconic story of the Three Kingdoms reimagined in cartoonish 3D fashion. Play through the chapters of the campaign and be greeted by familiar historical settings with witty dialogue. All mixed together with cartoons to bring you a VR drama piece you’ve never seen before. The tomes of history are yours to experience! Expansive Weapon System Choose from a selection of iconic weapons found throughout history. The Crescent Moon Blade for those who like to keep the enemy at bay, and the Dragon Blade for those who want to keep things up close and personal. There’s a blade for every occasion, which paired with a plethora of Armor Enhancements shall make you an unstoppable warrior! Cinematic Selfies Just beat the crap out of LvBu? Got your ass kicked by ZhangJiao? Not to fear, with the in-game selfie feature you’re free to snap your favorite moments to be preserved for all time. Now with epic cosplaying features! Once a level is complete simply turn around, strike a pose, put on your best picture face and slice the camera to take the most epic selfie of all time! You can also easily share these selfies with your friends on Facebook and Wechat. Ultimate POWER!!! Why settle to be a simple warrior when the power of godhood is within your grasp? Wield the powers of heaven and strike down your opponents with godly lightning or summon archers to back you up when things get tense. Annihilation is at your fingertips. Beat the highscores in leaderboards Challenge in endless mode, felt a surge of pure adrenaline in infinite enemy wave, see how long you can get, grab your spear and wave your sword ,it is time to testify your true quality of a hero.A wild goose leaves behind a voice; a man leaves behind a reputation,History will hand down your name, Become a legend.! Egg-full of Surprises Elite magic weapon，Snake Spear and Green Dragon Blade only can been found in the egg, There are more masks and armor components awaiting you! GOOD LUCK!
